original_text: And this shall be the plague wherewith the Lord will smite all the people that have fought against Jerusalem; Their flesh shall consume away while they stand upon their feet, and their eyes shall consume away in their holes, and their tongue shall consume away in their mouth.
korean_text: 예루살렘을 친 모든 백성에게 여호와께서 내리실 재앙은 이러하니 곧 섰을 때에 그들의 살이 썩으며 그들의 눈동자가 눈구멍 속에서 썩으며 그들의 혀가 입 속에서 썩을 것이요

sentences.original_text: And this shall be the plague
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 이것이 그 재앙이 될 것이니

sentences.original_text: all the people that have fought against Jerusalem
while they stand upon their feet
and their eyes shall consume away
and their tongue shall consume away
